message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire something that will bring you a lot of value. I'm willing to start with a price of $12000, which is a fair price considering the product's worth to you is $15000.

I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, considering the product's worth to you is $8000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I understand you're looking to meet in the middle, but I'm not quite ready to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, which would be $12000. I'm now offering the product to you for $11000. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to you is $15000.

I understand your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to offer $9500. This is a fair price considering the product's worth to you is $8000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go below $10500. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm now offering the product to you for $10500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to offer $9000. This is the highest I'm willing to go. Would you be willing to consider this price?
